CustomField.description: Used in "Reunion Confirmed Practitioner" email templates.
CustomField.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL(Delivery_Type__c, "Online"), IF(ISBLANK(Venue__c), "Thank you for agreeing to facilitate the " + TEXT( Course__r.Sub_Type__c ) + " reunion. All the confirmed clients on the course have now received a reunion confirmation email." + "They have been informed that the reunion will be held on " + Day_of_Week__c + " " + TEXT(Date__c) + " from " + Start_Text__c + " to " + End_Text__c + " and that it will be a live, interactive online session for which they will receive Zoom access details nearer the time." + BR() + BR() ,
"Thank you for agreeing to facilitate the " + TEXT( Course__r.Sub_Type__c ) + " reunion. All the confirmed clients on the course have now received a reunion confirmation email." + "They have been informed that the reunion will be held on " + Day_of_Week__c + " " + TEXT(Date__c) + " from " + Start_Text__c + " to " + End_Text__c + " and that you will be a live, interactive online session for which they have been sent the Zoom access details." + BR() + BR() ) , "")
CustomField.label: Reunion Online Practitioner Message
